citation.article-title: Proposal of Parvimonas gen. nov. and Quatrionicoccus gen. nov. as replacements for the illegitimate, prokaryotic, generic names Micromonas Murdoch and Shah 2000 and Quadricoccus Maszenan et al. 2002, respectively.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Parvimonas Tindall and Euzéby gen. nov.
Parvimonas (Par.vi′mo.nas. L. adj. parvus little, small; L. fem. n. monas a unit, monad; N.L. fem. n. Parvimonas a small monad).
Previous illegitimate name Micromonas Murdoch and Shah 2000.
The description of the genus is as given for Micromonas in Murdoch & Shah (1999).
The type species is Parvimonas micra (Prévot 1933) Tindall and Euzéby.
